name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: net.topology.script.number.args
description:
The max number of args that the script configured with
    net.topology.script.file.name should be run with. Each arg is an
    IP address.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms
description:
Job history files older than this many milliseconds will
  be deleted when the history cleaner runs. Defaults to 604800000 (1 week).

name: dfs.client.read.shortcircuit.streams.cache.expiry.ms
description:
This controls the minimum amount of time
    file descriptors need to sit in the client cache context
    before they can be closed for being inactive for too long.

name: dfs.datanode.directoryscan.interval
description:
Interval in seconds for Datanode to scan data directories and
  reconcile the difference between blocks in memory and on the disk.
  Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
  in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
  is assumed.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.size
description: Size of the EncryptedKeyVersion cache Queue for each key

name: dfs.datanode.data.dir.perm
description:
Permissions for the directories on on the local filesystem where
  the DFS data node store its blocks. The permissions can either be octal or
  symbolic.
